welcome_message_body: Welcome to Seto, Japan! Known for its rich ceramics tradition and charming streets, we invite you to explore our beautiful city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Macaroni Cafe & Bakery (マカロニカフェ＆ベーカリー)

restaurants.address: 祖母懐町45, 瀬戸市, 愛知県, 489-0825
